message: Let's start fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you
Let's flip the script. I'm offering you 40% this time, a fair trade for rejecting my proposal.
Still willing to compromise, 58% for me, 42% for you
I'm willing to move closer to your last offer, but I believe 55% for me is a fair compromise. Let's make a deal.
Getting closer, 57% for me, 43% for you, let's settle
I'm happy to meet you halfway, 56% for me and 44% for you. Let's wrap this up.
Small concession, 56.5% for me, 43.5% for you, last chance before things get tough
I'm willing to go up to 57%, but I believe this is our last chance to reach a deal. Let's avoid ending up with nothing.
